name: Stalfoss
description: A type of skeletal enemy with different movement behaviors.

fields.name: Type
fields.description: Defines the behavior or type of the Stalfoss.

0.name: Default
0.description: The default behavior of the Stalfoss.

1.name: Jumps
1.description: The Stalfoss jumps when it is attacked.

2.name: Jumps And Throws
2.description: The Stalfoss jumps when attacked and throws a bone.
